analyzed: na hetum no āsavam dhammam paṭicca
na hetum na no āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca
na hetum na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca
na hetum na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca
na hetum no āsavam ca iva na anāsavam ca dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca
na hetum na āsavam ca iva na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na hetum āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca pe na hetum āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paṭicca
